name: GPT-Replit
description: A little ChatGPT in your Replit editor that can view your files (if you want).
longDescription: A little ChatGPT in your Replit editor. If you open a file with GPT-replit, the file contents will be passed to the AI so you can ask questions about it.

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Reading the opened file to provide more information to GPT
